EmailTemplate.description: Para indicar que su solicitud se canalizó al área correspondiente, en inglés
EmailTemplate.name: Respuesta a clientes en inglés
EmailTemplate.subject: DuPont - Response to your request
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Lead.FirstName} {!Lead.LastName},
We appreciate your interest in our company and products. Your request has been assigned to one of our representatives, who is going to handle your request.
Request: {!Lead.Product_Comments__c} {!Lead.Description}
Best regards and thanks,
DuPont Mexico, Central America & Caribbean Phone: 52 1 (55) 5722 1150 E-mail: info.mexico@dupont.com | Webpage: www.dupont.com.mx Twitter @DuPontMexico | YouTube: DuPontdeMexico - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - DuPont cares about your privacy. Your personal information (name, eMail, phone number and other contact data) will be stored in chosen customer systems primarily hosted in the United States. This information will be used by DuPont, its affiliates, partners, and selected third parties in other countries to provide you with the product or service information requested. To learn more, please visit www.privacy.dupont.com. By providing your personal information, you agree to the terms and conditions of this Privacy Statement. To access, modify or delete your personal information, please submit a request in the following link: http://www.dupont.com/forms/privacy-request.html?lang=ENG
